description: Try our easy to follow Slow-Cooked Chicken Stew recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Slow-Cooked Chicken Stew Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 600 g skinless chicken thigh fillets, halved

recipeInstructions.text: Add stock, cover saucepan and simmer on low heat for 20 minutes. Add the Woolworths Winter Veg Mix and cook for a further 10 minutes and season with pepper to taste. Divide stew among serving bowls and serve with flatbread.
